benchmark_details.name: PyTorrent
benchmark_details.overview: PyTorrent is a dataset of 218,814 Python package libraries mined from PyPI and Anaconda, designed to facilitate active Software Engineering research, focusing on code reuse and comprehensibility by providing rich natural language (NL) and programming language (PL) pairings.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive dataset that assists in building off-the-shelf machine learning models for Software Engineering tasks without extensive infrastructure.

data.source: 218,814 Python package libraries from PyPI and Anaconda.
data.annotation: Pairs of source code and their natural language descriptions extracted and organized.

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on the source codes and docstrings extracted.
methodology.interpretation: Higher volume indicates a richer dataset for code generation and retrieval models.
methodology.validation: Dataset validated against existing data schemas and existing benchmarks for consistency.

harm: Potential for bias in code generation based on existing libraries
